Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: All the sons of the king were reduced to ashes and all his forces were destroyed while lamenting.74
When those prices of great glory were burnt down then the pride of all was smashed.75.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੜਦਿਆਂ (ਵੇਖ ਕੇ) (ਨਾਲ ਗਏ) ਗੋਡਿਆਂ ਤਕ ਬਾਹਵਾ ਵਾਲੇ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That most powerful Lord is extremely Glorious and the warriors of all the four directions fear Him.76.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੜਦਿਆਂ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ (ਨਾਲ ਗਏ) ਯੋਧੇ ਚਿਤ ਵਿਚ
ਅਤੇ ਜਾ ਕੇ (ਰਾਜਕੁਮਾਰਾ ਦੀ ਸਥਿਤੀ ਦਾ) ਸੰਦੇਸ਼ ਦਿੱਤਾ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Some warriors who had been burnt, ran impatiently towards the king and they conveyed the whole thing to the king sagar.77.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਿਥੇ ਸਗਰ ਰਾਜਾ ਦੇਸ਼ (ਵਿਚ ਬੈਠਾ ਯੱਗ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ) ॥੭੭॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: When the king sagar saw this, he impatiently asked the news about his sons.78.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਬਚਨ ਉਚਾਰੇ (ਪਰ ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਦੀਆਂ) ਅੱਖਾ ਵਿਚ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Then all of them talked about their strength and also said how the pried of those warriors was destroyed, the tears were flowing from their eyes while saying this.79.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਨੇ ਸਾਰੀ) ਭੂਮੀ ਉਤੇ ਯੱਗ ਘੋੜਾ ਫਿਰਾ ਕੇ
ਅਤੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਰਾਜਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਜਿਤ ਕੇ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The messengers told this that his sons, causing their horse to move on all the earth, had conquered all the kings and had taken them along with themselves.80.
Your sons, thinking that the horse had gone to the nether-world, had dug the whole of the earth and in this way, their pride had enormously increased.81.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ (ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਦਾ) ਹੰਕਾਰ ਬਹੁਤ ਵਧ ਗਿਆ ॥੮੧॥
ਜੋ ਉਦਾਰਤਾ ਵਾਲੇ ਗੁਣਾ ਨਾਲ ਵਰੁਸਾਇਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਸੀ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: There all of them saw themost glorious sage (Kapila) absorbed in meditation.82.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਯੋਧਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਨਾਲ ਲੈ ਕੇ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Your sons, taking the warriors with them, hit that sage with their legs.83.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤਦ ਮਹਾਨ ਮਨ ਵਾਲੇ ਮੁਨੀ ਦਾ
(ਅਤੇ ਉਸ ਦੀਆਂ ਅੱਖਾ ਵਿਚੋਂ) ਜੁਆਲਾ ਨਿਕਲੀ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Then the meditation of that great sage was shattered and a huge fire came out of his eyes.84.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਜੰਗਲ ਦੀ ਵਿਸ਼ਾਲ ਅੱਗ ਵਰਗੀ ਸੀ ॥੮੪॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The messenger told, “O king Sagar! in this way all your sons were burnt and reduced to ashes alongwith their army and not even one of them survived.”85.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਰਾਜ ਪੁੱਤਰਾ ਦਾ ਨਾਸ਼ ਸੁਣ ਕੇ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Hearing about the destruction of his sons, the whole city was steeped in sorrow and all the people here and there were filled with anguish.86.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਅੰਤ ਵਿਚ ਸਗਰ ਰਾਜੇ ਨੇ) 'ਸ਼ਿਵ ਸ਼ਿਵ' ਬਚਨ ਸਿਮਰ ਕੇ
ਅਤੇ ਅੱਖਾ ਦੇ ਹੰਝੂ ਰੋਕ ਕੇ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: All of them, remembering Shiva, withholding their tears assumed patience in their minds with the holy saying of the sages.87.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਮੁਨੀ ਵਾਗ ਮਨ ਨੂੰ ਪਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਕੀਤਾ ॥੮੭॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Then the king performed the last funeral rites of all affectionately according to Vedic injunctions.88.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਹੋਰ ਧਰਮਕਰਮ ਬੜੀ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਨਾਲ ਕੀਤੇ ॥੮੮॥
ਫਿਰ ਪੁੱਤਰਾ ਦੇ ਸੋਗ ਵਿਚ ਹੀ
ਰਾਜਾ ਸਵਰਗ ਲੋਕ ਨੂੰ ਚਲਾ ਗਿਆ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In his extreme sorrow on the demise of his sons, the king left for heaven and after him, there were several other kings, who can describe them?89.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਦਾ) ਕਥਨ ਕੌਣ ਕਰ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ? ॥੮੯॥

lines.gurmukhi: ieiq rwjw swgr ko rwj smwpqM ]4]5]
lines.transliteration_english: eit raajaa saagar ko raaj samaapatan ||4||5||
lines.transliteration_hindi: इति राजा सागर को राज समापतं ॥४॥५॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: End of the description of Vyas, the incrnation of Brahma and the rule of king Prithu in Bachittar Natak.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਥੇ ਰਾਜਾ ਸਗਰ ਦੇ ਰਾਜ ਦੀ ਸਮਾਪਤੀ। ਹੁਣ ਜੁਜਾਤਿ ਰਾਜੇ ਦੇ ਰਾਜ ਦਾ ਕਥਨ
